languages.text: "Служу... династии!" {n}Мысли фактотума начинают путаться.{/n} "Бумаги, Ваша Светлость!.. Пусть секретарь перепроверит грузовые накладные — я не успел заверить печати... мое завещание в левом ящике..."

"Proud to serve... the dynasty!" {n}Janris's thoughts are becoming muddled.{/n} "The papers, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Have the clerk double-check the freight bills... I did not have time to get the seals... My will is in the left-hand drawer..."
languages.original_text: "Служу... династии!" {n}Мысли фактотума начинают путаться.{/n} "Бумаги, Ваша Светлость!.. Пусть секретарь перепроверит грузовые накладные — я не успел заверить печати... мое завещание в левом ящике..."

"Proud to serve... the dynasty!" {n}Janris's thoughts are becoming muddled.{/n} "The papers, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Have the clerk double-check the freight bills... I did not have time to get the seals... My will is in the left-hand drawer..."

"Proud to serve... the dynasty!" {n}Janris's thoughts are becoming muddled.{/n} "The papers, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Have the clerk double-check the freight bills... I did not have time to get the seals... My will is in the left-hand drawer..."

languages.text: "Voller Stolz habe ich ... der Dynastie gedient!" {n}Janris' Gedanken werden wirr.{/n} "Die Papiere, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Der Sekretär soll die Frachtrechnungen noch einmal prüfen ... Ich hatte keine Zeit mehr für die Siegel ... Mein Testament ist in der linken Schublade ..."
languages.original_text: "Proud to serve... the dynasty!" {n}Janris's thoughts are becoming muddled.{/n} "The papers, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Have the clerk double-check the freight bills... I did not have time to get the seals... My will is in the left-hand drawer..."

traits.locale_text: "Voller Stolz habe ich ... der Dynastie gedient!" {n}Janris' Gedanken werden wirr.{/n} "Die Papiere, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Der Sekretär soll die Frachtrechnungen noch einmal prüfen ... Ich hatte keine Zeit mehr für die Siegel ... Mein Testament ist in der linken Schublade ..."

languages.text: «¡Es un orgullo servir... a la dinastía!». {n}La mente de Janris empieza a nublarse.{/n} «¡Los documentos, mi{mf|lord|lady}! Diga al escriba que coteje los albaranes de entrega... No he tenido tiempo de conseguir los sellos... Mi testamento está en el cajón de la izquierda...».
languages.original_text: "Proud to serve... the dynasty!" {n}Janris's thoughts are becoming muddled.{/n} "The papers, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Have the clerk double-check the freight bills... I did not have time to get the seals... My will is in the left-hand drawer..."

traits.locale_text: «¡Es un orgullo servir... a la dinastía!». {n}La mente de Janris empieza a nublarse.{/n} «¡Los documentos, mi{mf|lord|lady}! Diga al escriba que coteje los albaranes de entrega... No he tenido tiempo de conseguir los sellos... Mi testamento está en el cajón de la izquierda...».

languages.text: 「王朝に仕えることを…誇りに思います！」{n}ジャンリスの思考がぼんやりとしてくる。{/n}「書類です、陛下！事務員に運賃請求書を再チェックさせてください…印をもらう時間がなく…私の遺書は左の引き出しに…」
languages.original_text: "Proud to serve... the dynasty!" {n}Janris's thoughts are becoming muddled.{/n} "The papers, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Have the clerk double-check the freight bills... I did not have time to get the seals... My will is in the left-hand drawer..."

traits.locale_text: 「王朝に仕えることを…誇りに思います！」{n}ジャンリスの思考がぼんやりとしてくる。{/n}「書類です、陛下！事務員に運賃請求書を再チェックさせてください…印をもらう時間がなく…私の遺書は左の引き出しに…」

languages.text: “能侍奉王朝，是我的……骄傲！”{n}詹里斯的思绪变得越来越混乱。{/n}“对了，还有文件，大人！让文员再检查一遍运费单……我没抽出时间去拿印章……我的遗嘱在左手边的抽屉里……”
languages.original_text: "Proud to serve... the dynasty!" {n}Janris's thoughts are becoming muddled.{/n} "The papers, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Have the clerk double-check the freight bills... I did not have time to get the seals... My will is in the left-hand drawer..."

traits.locale_text: “能侍奉王朝，是我的……骄傲！”{n}詹里斯的思绪变得越来越混乱。{/n}“对了，还有文件，大人！让文员再检查一遍运费单……我没抽出时间去拿印章……我的遗嘱在左手边的抽屉里……”

languages.text: « Je suis fier de servir... la dynastie ! {n}Les pensées de Janris commencent à s'embrouiller.{/n} Les papiers, Votre Seigneurie ! Demandez au greffier de vérifier les bons de transport... Je n'ai pas eu le temps de faire apposer les sceaux... Mon testament est dans le tiroir de gauche... »
languages.original_text: "Proud to serve... the dynasty!" {n}Janris's thoughts are becoming muddled.{/n} "The papers, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Have the clerk double-check the freight bills... I did not have time to get the seals... My will is in the left-hand drawer..."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis fier de servir... la dynastie ! {n}Les pensées de Janris commencent à s'embrouiller.{/n} Les papiers, Votre Seigneurie ! Demandez au greffier de vérifier les bons de transport... Je n'ai pas eu le temps de faire apposer les sceaux... Mon testament est dans le tiroir de gauche... »

languages.text: "Hanedanlığa hizmet etmek... Bir onur!" {n}Janris'in düşünceleri karman çorman hâle geliyor.{/n} "Belgeler {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Kâtip nakliye faturalarını iki kere kontrol etsin... Mühürleri alacak zamanım olmadı... Vasiyetim sol çekmecede..."
languages.original_text: "Proud to serve... the dynasty!" {n}Janris's thoughts are becoming muddled.{/n} "The papers, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Have the clerk double-check the freight bills... I did not have time to get the seals... My will is in the left-hand drawer..."
